alert.note: Alert for Southwest San Juan Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 3:21AM MST until January 15 at 11:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Storm total snowfall of 10 to 20 inches anticipated with higher amounts near Wolf Creek Pass. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Southwest San Juan Mountains. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
